title: Captured in time: favourites from the sixties from the Cinesound / Movietone newsreels.
brief_description: In the years before television, millions of Australians made the weekly pilgramage to cinemas to catch the latest edition of the Cinesound and Movietone News. This video includes newsreels of the last lamplighter in Australia and the visit of American President, Lyndon B. Johnson.
